s = input()

if s == s[::-1]:
    if s[:len(s)//2] == s[:len(s)//2][::-1]:
        if s[len(s)//2+1:] == s[len(s)//2+1:][::-1]:
            print('Yes')
        else:
            print('No')
    else:
        print('No')
else:
    print('No')
